content.text: Nothing much, just got back from the farmers market, how about you?
I'm good, just finished a music lesson. What kind of stuff did you get at the market?
I got some fresh fruit and veggies, and some meat for grilling this weekend.
That sounds great! I love going to farmers markets, but I don't always get a chance to go.
Yeah, I know what you mean. They can be a little pricey, but I think they're worth it.
Yeah, I definitely agree. Plus, it's nice to support local farmers.
Exactly! What kind of music do you play?
I play guitar and sing. I'm actually in a band!
That's awesome! What kind of music do you play?
We're a rock band, but we also play some pop and country.
That sounds really cool! I've always wanted to be in a band.
It's a lot of fun, but it can also be a lot of work.
I bet! But it sounds like you're doing well with it.
Thanks! We're just starting out, but we're having a lot of fun.
Well, good luck with your band! I'm sure you'll do great.
